title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Cardinals head coach Kliff Kingsbury is already on the hot seat heading into tonight's game against the Saints. He advocates for the Pelicans to take extreme measures to keep Zion Williamson healthy after another impressive start to the season. He also supports Tom Brady for yelling at teammates as they've been under performing for several weeks in a row now. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to discuss Daniel Jones' surprising success through 6 weeks and what's wrong with Kyler Murray. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
